name: polymer-minesweeper
description: using Polymer to build minesweeper the game
author: AdamYee

scripts.clean: rm -r es6/*; rm -r demo/*; rm -r lib/*
scripts.copyHtml: cp play-minesweeper.html ms-board.html ms-cell.html demo; cp src/index.html demo
scripts.build: npm run 6to5 && npm run copyES6 && npm run copyHtml && npm run copyPolyfill
